DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate two different treatments in subjects with chronic pancreatitis, exocrine pancreatic insufficiency and chronic abdominal pain.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of EUR-1066 in Subjects With Chronic Pancreatitis, Exocrine Pancreatic Insufficiency and Chronic Abdominal Pain
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate two different preparations of a pancreatic enzyme in subjects with chronic pancreatitis, exocrine pancreatic insufficiency, and chronic abdominal pain.
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of Chronic Pancreatitis Exocrine Pancreatic Insufficiency Chronic abdominal pain Acute pancreatitis Active alcohol consumption Uncontrolled diabetes
